description: This is a C++ unit test file using Google Test framework to test the functionality of the Rectangle class, including its constructors, operators, and methods like Contains and Overlaps.

classes.name: Rectangle
classes.description: A class representing a geometric rectangle with methods for comparison, combination, and spatial relation checks.

methods.name: Contains
methods.description: Checks if the rectangle contains a specific point.

methods.name: Overlaps
methods.description: Checks if the rectangle overlaps with another rectangle.

methods.name: combine
methods.description: Creates a new rectangle that is the union of two rectangles.
